trends: There have been 33 other sightings in Vancouver
There were no other sightings in Vancouver on or around February 18th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was two blocks east of 18th Ave and Cambie St in Vancouver. I was going to my truck to get my jacket and looked west up in the sky (something I'm always doing I think in this case though I was looking up to see what the weather was like) It was clear skies for the most part. My gf's street is has a lot of trees on it so the spot i looked up was really one of the few openings I could see from where my truck was parked. I could see planes flying off in the distance, but something different caught my attention. There was a bright Orange object in the sky. I would say a little larger and a little brighter than what a planet looks like in the sky only this was Orange in color. It seemed pretty far away, i would say at least a few miles. That's what stuck out initially. I told my gf to look at it (she is very skeptical about this type of stuff) while I grabbed my jacket quick. She even made some comments that it didn't look like a plane or anything (you could see another plane north west of it with marker lights and everything). I stood there for another minute and watched it move. The orange object made kind of a clockwise circular movement and then at the 6oclock position it started to move in a straight line and then stopped. We now began to walk west towards Cambie St hoping to get a better vantage point. I was even tripping a few times on the sidewalk as I was glued to the sky. Once we got a better view I stopped because it started to get dimmer. My view was framed to the left by a large tree, the bottom by a house, and to the right was a smaller tree. The Orange object was located i would say about a 45o angle of elevation. As it was fading (slowly) it wasn't moving it only flickered a few times. I paid attention to the fact that it wasn't moving over anything on the horizon. And then just like that it was gone. And I went on with my night. The sighting was really fast, I only had my cell phone and don't think it would have showed that well. I think my drawings will better represent what we saw. My gf can verify everything we saw from the movement, it's brightness, and it fading to nothing while not moving.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: Bright Orange object random movements then fades or disappears
